segments.text: The air conditioning is not working ! We need to call a handyman before we start to fry in here !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Dan is on top of that . I think they are also getting the handyman to fix the bathroom toilet that keeps clogging up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That would be convenient . They might as well ask him to fix the electrical wiring . The circuit breakers keep going out all the time . It ’ s really annoying !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah you are right . This office is falling apart ! Frank told me the other day that the gutters outside were clogged and that ’ s why the parking lot was flooded .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know ! I was in ankle deep water trying to get to my car that day ! The handyman definitely has his work cut out for him .
segments.speaker: S1
